mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction_currency_coefficient_tab (orderNo, currencyId, currencyName, currencyCoefficient, backerAccount, ipAddress, addTime) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{currencyId}, #{currencyName}, #{currencyCoefficient}, #{backerAccount}, #{ipAddress}, #{addTime})
mapper.select: SELECT orderNo, currencyId, currencyName, currencyCoefficient, backerAccount, ipAddress, addTime FROM transaction_currency_coefficient_tab WHERE orderNo = #{orderNo}
SELECT orderNo, currencyId, currencyName, currencyCoefficient, backerAccount, ipAddress, addTime FROM transaction_currency_coefficient_tab WHERE currencyId = #{currencyId} ORDER BY addTime DESC
